name: moltbot-sandbox
description: Run Moltbot personal AI assistant in a Cloudflare Sandbox

AI_GATEWAY_API_KEY.description: AI Gateway auth key (for cf-aig-authorization header). Get this from your [AI Gateway dashboard](https://dash.cloudflare.com/?to=/:account/ai/ai-gateway/).

AI_GATEWAY_BASE_URL.description: AI Gateway compat endpoint URL. Find this in your [AI Gateway dashboard](https://dash.cloudflare.com/?to=/:account/ai/ai-gateway/).

AI_GATEWAY_PROVIDER_API_KEY.description: Provider API key (e.g., your [Anthropic API key](https://console.anthropic.com/)). Used for the Authorization header.

AI_GATEWAY_CUSTOM_PROVIDER.description: Custom provider name from your AI Gateway dashboard (e.g., `cliproxyapi-anthropic`).

MOLTBOT_GATEWAY_TOKEN.description: Token for gateway access. Generate with: openssl rand -hex 32
